content.text: To reduce the risk of damage, any structural metallic elements of cables (e.g. armouring or strength  members) should be electrically continuous along the length of cable.

Additional connections to earth of any structural metallic elements of cables (e.g. armouring or strength  members) should be applied following consideration of EN 61663-1 for optical fibre cable and to EN 61663-2 for copper cable as well as EN 62305 series.
